data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Santana, Carlos David De, Maldonado-Ocampo, Javier A. (2004): Redescription of Apteronotus mariae (Eigenmann & Fisher, 1914) and the taxonomic status of Apteronotus jurubidae (Fowler, 1944) (Gymnotiformes: Apteronotidae). Zootaxa 632: 1-14, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.158535
